Ali_al-Hadi_children.name: Hasan al-Askari
Ali_al-Hadi_children.notes: Also known as Imam Hasan al-Askari. He was the eleventh Shia Imam.

Ali_al-Hadi_children.name: Ja'far ibn Ali al-Hadi
Ali_al-Hadi_children.notes: Known as Ja'far al-Kadhab. He claimed the Imamate after the death of Hasan al-Askari.

Ali_al-Hadi_children.name: Muhammad ibn Ali al-Hadi
Ali_al-Hadi_children.notes: Little is known about his life.

Ali_al-Hadi_children.name: Husayn ibn Ali al-Hadi
Ali_al-Hadi_children.notes: Little is known about his life.

Ali_al-Hadi_children.name: Aisha bint Ali al-Hadi
Ali_al-Hadi_children.notes: Little is known about her life.
